translation.pt: as vidas ficaram menos lineares
translation.en: people’s lives became less linear,

translation.pt: e as águas de cristal ficaram pardas.

translation.pt: Mandad’ei comigo

translation.pt: ca ven meu amigo:
translation.en: my friend’s on his way,

translation.en: and I’m going, mother, to Vigo!

translation.pt: ca ven meu amado:
translation.en: my friend is arriving,

translation.en: and I’m going, mother, to Vigo!

translation.pt: Ca ven meu amigo

translation.pt: e ven san’e vivo:
translation.en: and is alive and well,

translation.en: and I’m going, mother, to Vigo!

translation.pt: Ca ven meu amado

translation.en: and is well and alive,

translation.en: and I’m going, mother, to Vigo!

translation.pt: Ca ven san’e vivo
translation.en: He’s alive and well

translation.pt: e d’el rei amigo:
translation.en: and is the king’s friend,

translation.pt: E irei, madr’, a Vigo!
translation.en: and I’m going, mother, to Vigo!

translation.pt: Ca ven viv’e sano
translation.en: He’s well and alive

translation.pt: e d’el rei privado:
translation.en: and is the king’s ally,

translation.pt: E irei, madr’, a Vigo!
translation.en: and I’m going, mother, to Vigo!

translation.en: a body for covering your absence

translation.pt: um perfume

translation.en: this or its contrary, but somehow gaping

translation.en: and with many people there to see what it is

translation.en: this or a population of sixty thousand souls devouring scarlet pillows on their way to the sea

translation.pt: encostadas aos submarinos
translation.en: next to the submarines

translation.pt: isto ou um torso desalojado de um verso
translation.en: this or a torso dislodged from a verse

translation.pt: e cuja morte é o orgulho de todos
translation.en: and whose death makes everyone proud

translation.en: o pallid city built

translation.pt: como uma febre entre dois patamares!
translation.en: like a fever between two floors!

translation.pt: terra para encher candelabros
translation.en: dirt for filling up candelabras

translation.en: smoldering beds for erect lovers

translation.pt: tabuinhas com palavras interditas
translation.en: slates with forbidden words

translation.en: – a woman for the fellow who’s losing interest in life (Here, take her!),

translation.pt: dois netos para essa velha aí no fim da fila – não temos mais –
translation.en: two grandchildren for the old woman at the end of the line (That’s all we have!) –

translation.en: and for you and for me, favorably situated,

translation.en: some poison to pour into the giant’s eyes

translation.en: waiting

translation.pt: aceso entre a folhagem das mais altas lâmpadas
translation.en: shimmering amid the foliage of the loftiest lamps

translation.en: that comes in through the window      that goes out by the roof

translation.pt: Pois convém tornar claro o coração do homem
translation.en: For it is good to clarify the heart of man

translation.pt: E erguer a negra exactidão da cruz
translation.en: And to lift the black exactness of the cross

translation.pt: Na luz branca de Creta
translation.en: In the white light of Crete

translation.pt: Há feridas cíclicas há violentos voos
translation.en: There are cyclical wounds furious flights

translation.pt: dentro de câmaras de ar curvas
translation.en: inside rounded air sacs

translation.pt: feridas que se pensam de noite
translation.en: wounds that are thought of at night

translation.pt: e rebentam pela manhã
translation.en: and break out in the morning

translation.pt: ou que de noite se abrem
translation.en: or that open up at night

translation.pt: e pela manhã são pensadas
translation.en: and in the morning are thought of

translation.pt: com todos os pensamentos
translation.en: along with the other thoughts

translation.pt: que os órgãos são hábeis
translation.en: our organs are adept

translation.pt: em inventar como pensos
translation.en: at inventing like bandages

translation.pt: ligaduras capacetes
translation.en: compresses helmets

translation.pt: sacramentos
translation.en: sacraments

translation.pt: com que se prende a cabeça
translation.en: for securing the head

translation.pt: quando ela se nos afasta
translation.en: when it breaks away from us

translation.pt: quando ela nos pressente
translation.en: when it’s able to sense us

translation.pt: em síncope ou desnudamento
translation.en: in a syncope or naked exposure

translation.pt: ou num erro mais espaçoso
translation.en: or in a more spacious error

translation.pt: ou numa letra mais muda
translation.en: or in a quieter letter

translation.pt: ou na sala de tortura
translation.en: or in the torture chamber

translation.pt: na sala escura, de infância.
translation.en: in the dark chamber, of childhood.

translation.pt: Acaba mal o teu verso,
translation.en: Make your verse flawed,

translation.pt: mas fá-lo com um desígnio:
translation.en: but do it for a reason:

translation.pt: é um mal que não é mal,
translation.en: with flaws that aren’t mistakes,

translation.pt: é lutar contra o bonito.
translation.en: in the fight against what’s pretty.

translation.pt: Vai-me a essas rimas que
translation.en: Seize for me those perfectly

translation.pt: tão bem desfecham e que
translation.en: round rhymes that are

translation.pt: são o pão de ló dos tolos
translation.en: the sweet rolls of fools

translation.pt: e torce-lhes o pescoço,
translation.en: and break their necks,

translation.pt: tal como o outro pedia
translation.en: as someone else demanded

translation.pt: se fizesse à eloquência,
translation.en: that we do to eloquence.

translation.pt: e se houver um vossa excelência
translation.en: And if there’s an Excellency

translation.pt: que grite: – Não é poesia!,
translation.en: who screams “This isn’t poetry!”,

translation.pt: diz-lhe que não, que não é,
translation.en: tell him that no, it isn’t –

translation.pt: que é topada, lixa três,
translation.en: it’s a stumbling, it’s sandpaper,

translation.pt: serração, vidro moído,
translation.en: the act of sawing, crushed glass,

translation.pt: papel que se rasga ou pe-
translation.en: shredded paper or a stone roll-

translation.pt: dra que rola na pedra . . .
translation.en: ing against a stone . . .

translation.pt: Mas também da rima “em cheio”
translation.en: But you can also make use

translation.pt: poderás tirar partido,
translation.en: of neat, regular rhyme,

translation.pt: que a regra é não haver regra,
translation.en: for the rule is there’s no rule

translation.pt: a não ser a de cada um,
translation.en: except for your own rule,

translation.pt: com sua rima, seu ritmo,
translation.en: with your rhyme and rhythm,

translation.pt: não fazer bom e bonito,
translation.en: to make it not simply pretty

translation.pt: mas fazer bom e expressivo . . .
translation.en: but simply expressive . . .

translation.pt: A cidade caía
translation.en: The city falling

translation.pt: casa a casa
translation.en: house by house

translation.pt: do céu sobre as colinas,
translation.en: from the sky down to the hills,

translation.pt: construída de cima para baixo
translation.en: from top to bottom built

translation.pt: por chuvas e neblinas,
translation.en: by rain and fog,

translation.pt: encontrava
translation.en: found

translation.pt: a outra cidade que subia
translation.en: that other city rising

translation.pt: do chão com o luar
translation.en: from the ground, with a moonlight

translation.pt: das janelas acesas
translation.en: of gleaming windows,

translation.pt: e nop ar
translation.en: and in the air

translation.pt: o choque as destruía
translation.en: the shock destroyed them

translation.pt: silenciosamente,
translation.en: silently,

translation.pt: de modo que se via
translation.en: so that all that could be seen

translation.pt: apenas a cidade inexistente.
translation.en: was the city that did not exist.

translation.pt: Não é difícil um homem apaixonar-se.
translation.en: It’s not hard for a man to fall in love,

translation.pt: Ferir a sua paisagem,
translation.en: to gash his landscape –

translation.pt: cinzas de um passado caído, fluente.
translation.en: ashes from a fallen, fluid past.

translation.pt: Ao fim de vidas partilhadas pode ser que
translation.en: At the end of our shared lives I might

translation.pt: diga “estremeci
translation.en: say “I trembled

translation.pt: durante anos sem te abraçar.” Agora é tarde.
translation.en: for years without hugging you.” Now it’s too late.

translation.pt: Agora é tarde sobre a terra cercada.
translation.en: Now it’s too late in this besieged country.

translation.pt: Por planícies ficou o desespero,
translation.en: Despair remained on the plains,

translation.pt: a dor lilás dos homens soçobrados
translation.en: and the lilac pain of broken men

translation.pt: na paciência nocturna.
translation.en: in the patience of night.

translation.pt: Só depois do terror os cães ladram fielmente
translation.en: Only after the terror do the dogs faithfully bark

translation.pt: aos portais da manhã, só
translation.en: at the gates of morning, only

translation.pt: após o gume das vidas partilhadas.
translation.en: after the cutting edge of shared lives.

translation.pt: “Passei a vida a fugir para a tua boca,” e
translation.en: “I spent life seeking shelter in your mouth,” and

translation.pt: confundo já o teu rosto
translation.en: already I confuse your face

translation.pt: com um qualquer.
translation.en: with some other.

translation.pt: Na minha juventude antes de ter saído
translation.en: When I was still young before I left home

translation.pt: da casa de meus pais disposto a viajar
translation.en: ready to travel around in the world

translation.pt: eu conhecia já o rebentar do mar
translation.en: I already knew about the waves’ breaking

translation.pt: das páginas dos livros que já tinha lido
translation.en: from the pages of all the books I’d read

translation.pt: Chegava o mês de maio era tudo florido
translation.en: When may rolled around everything was flowers

translation.pt: o rolo das manhãs punha-se a circular
translation.en: the morning turtledove flew here flew there

translation.pt: e era só ouvir o sonhador falar
translation.en: and to hear the dreamer just speak of life

translation.pt: da vida como se ela houvesse acontecido
translation.en: was like it having actually happened

translation.pt: E tudo se passava numa outra vida
translation.en: Everything took place in another life

translation.pt: e havia para as coisas sempre uma saída
translation.en: and there was always a way out when needed

translation.pt: Quando foi isso? Eu próprio não o sei dizer
translation.en: When was all this? Not even I can say

translation.pt: Só sei que tinha o poder duma criança
translation.en: I know only that I had a child’s power

translation.pt: entre as coisas e mim havia vizinhança
translation.en: all things were close to me and everything

translation.pt: e tudo era possível era só querer
translation.en: was possible I only had to want it

translation.pt: Que muyto m’eu pago d’este verão
translation.en: How very much I love this summer,

translation.pt: por estes rramos e por estas flores,
translation.en: its flowers, trees and sky above,

translation.pt: e polas aves que cantan d’amores,
translation.en: and all the birds that sing of love,

translation.pt: por que ando hy led’e sen cuydado;
translation.en: because I feel at peace and happy

translation.pt: e assy faz tod’omen namorado:
translation.en: and even handsome – that’s what happens

translation.pt: sempre y anda led’e muy loução.
translation.en: whenever anyone loves another.

translation.pt: Cand’eu passo per alg?as rribeiras,
translation.en: When I walk on certain shores,

translation.pt: so bõas arvores, per bõos prados,
translation.en: under branches and through pastures,

translation.pt: se cantan hy passaros namorados
translation.en: if I hear birds sing with passion

translation.pt: log’eu con amores hy vou cantando,
translation.en: then with love and all my heart

translation.pt: e log’aly d’amores vou trobando,
translation.en: and all I know of troubadour art

translation.pt: e faço cantares en mil maneyras.
translation.en: I make up songs of every sort.

translation.pt: Ey eu gran viço e grand’alegria
translation.en: I feel happy, all of a sudden,

translation.pt: quando mhas aves cantan no estyo.
translation.en: when I hear birds sing in summer.

translation.pt: O navio de espelhos
translation.en: The ship of mirrors

translation.pt: não navega, cavalga
translation.en: doesn’t sail, it gallops

translation.pt: Seu mar é a floresta
translation.en: Its sea is a forest

translation.pt: que lhe serve de nível
translation.en: serving as level plane

translation.pt: Ao crepúsculo espelha
translation.en: At dusk its flanks

translation.pt: sol e lua nos flancos
translation.en: mirror the sun and moon

translation.pt: (Por isso o tempo gosta
translation.en: That’s why time loves

translation.pt: de deitar-se com ele)
translation.en: to lie down with it

translation.pt: Os armadores não amam
translation.en: Shipowners don’t like

translation.pt: a sua rota clara
translation.en: its clear and bright route

translation.pt: (Vista do movimento
translation.en: (To someone in motion

translation.pt: dir-se-ia que pára)
translation.en: it looks stationary)

translation.pt: Quando chega à cidade
translation.en: When it reaches the city

translation.pt: nenhum cais o abriga
translation.en: no wharf gives it shelter

translation.pt: (O seu porão traz nada
translation.en: Its bilge brings nothing

translation.pt: nada leva à partida)
translation.en: it departs with nothing

translation.pt: Vozes e ar pesado
translation.en: Voices and heavy air

translation.pt: é tudo o que transporta
translation.en: are all it transports

translation.pt: (E no mastro espelhado
translation.en: And a species of door

translation.pt: uma espécie de porta)
translation.en: in its mirrored mast

translation.pt: Seus dez mil capitães
translation.en: Its ten thousand captains

translation.pt: têm o mesmo rosto
translation.en: all have the same face

translation.pt: (A mesma cinta escura
translation.en: The same dark belt

translation.pt: o mesmo grau e posto)
translation.en: the same rank and office

translation.pt: Quando um se revolta
translation.en: When one man revolts

translation.pt: há dez mil insurrectos
translation.en: there are ten thousand mutineers

translation.pt: (Como os olhos da mosca
translation.en: (The way objects are reflected

translation.pt: reflectem os objectos)
translation.en: in the eyes of a fly)

translation.pt: E quando um deles ala
translation.en: And when one of them ascends

translation.pt: o corpo sobre os mastros
translation.en: and his body climbs the masts

translation.pt: e escruta o mar do fundo
translation.en: and he scans the ocean depths

translation.pt: Toda a nave cavalga
translation.en: The whole ship gallops

translation.pt: (como no espaço os astros)
translation.en: (like the stars in space)

translation.pt: Do princípio do mundo
translation.en: From the world’s beginning

translation.pt: até ao fim do mundo
translation.en: to the world’s end

translation.pt: Podes pegar em mim, pesar-me na balança
translation.en: You can pick me up, put me on the scale

translation.pt: do sim e não, medir-me às polegadas a bondade;
translation.en: of yes and no, and measure my virtue in inches;

translation.pt: ainda eu guardo o coração em sítio seco
translation.en: my heart is still stored in a cool,

translation.pt: e fresco, e longe de palavras.
translation.en: dry place, far away from words.

translation.pt: E agrada-me estar só, na mais pequena cela
translation.en: And I like being alone, in the smallest cell

translation.pt: de uma prisão estéril entre os montes,
translation.en: of a sterile prison on the slopes,

translation.pt: toda a noite a cantar contra a janela
translation.en: singing all night long against my window

translation.pt: donde se avistam outras grades iguais.
translation.en: that looks out on to other, similarly barred windows.

translation.pt: Podes até dizer (mas não as dizes)
translation.en: You can even recite (but you don’t recite)

translation.pt: as engraçadas frases em que voas
translation.en: those funny sentences in which you fly

translation.pt: por distantes colinas, espantadas
translation.en: over distant hills that tremble in awe

translation.pt: de tão solene e nova madrugada;
translation.en: at such a solemn, utterly new dawn,

translation.pt: e trazer-me água fresca, que me enrolo
translation.en: and you can bring me cool water; I’ll still roll

translation.pt: em mim como um novelo e nem sequer
translation.en: myself into a tight ball and not budge

translation.pt: me movo quando o monstro inexplicável
translation.en: even when the inexplicable monster

translation.pt: com as suas garras rasga o meu lençol.
translation.en: rips my bedsheet with its claws.

translation.pt: Corpo num horizonte de água,
translation.en: Body on a horizon of water,

translation.pt: corpo aberto
translation.en: body open

translation.pt: à lenta embriaguez dos dedos,
translation.en: to the slow intoxication of fingers,

translation.pt: corpo defendido
translation.en: body defended

translation.pt: pelo fulgor das maçãs,
translation.en: by the splendour of apples,

translation.pt: rendido de colina em colina,
translation.en: surrendered hill by hill,

translation.pt: corpo amorosamente humedecido
translation.en: body lovingly made moist

translation.pt: pelo sol dócil da língua.
translation.en: by the tongue’s pliant sun.

translation.pt: Corpo com gosto a erva rasa
translation.en: Body with the taste of cropped grass

translation.pt: de secreto jardim,
translation.en: in a secret garden,

translation.pt: corpo onde entro em casa,
translation.en: body where I am at home,

translation.pt: corpo onde me deito
translation.en: body where I lie down

translation.pt: para sugar o silêncio,
translation.en: to suck up silence,

translation.pt: ouvir
translation.en: to hear

translation.pt: o rumo das espigas,
translation.en: the murmur of blades of grain,

translation.pt: respirar
translation.en: to breathe

translation.pt: a doçura escuríssima das silvas.
translation.en: the deep dark sweetness of the bramble bush.

translation.pt: Corpo de mil bocas,
translation.en: Body of a thousand mouths,

translation.pt: e todas fulvas de alegria,
translation.en: all tawny with joy,

translation.pt: todas para sorver,
translation.en: all ready to sip,

translation.pt: todas para morder até que um grito
translation.en: ready to bite till a scream

translation.pt: irrompa das entranhas,
translation.en: bursts from the bowels

translation.pt: e suba às torres,
translation.en: and mounts to the towers

translation.pt: e suplique um punhal.
translation.en: and pleads for a dagger.

translation.pt: Corpo para entregar às lágrimas.
translation.en: Body for surrendering to tears.

translation.pt: Corpo para morrer.
translation.en: Body ripe for death.

translation.pt: Corpo para beber até ao fim –
translation.en: Body for imbibing to the end –

translation.pt: meu oceano breve
translation.en: my ocean, brief

translation.pt: e branco,
translation.en: and white,

translation.pt: minha secreta embarcação
translation.en: my secret vessel,

translation.pt: meu vento favorável,
translation.en: my propitious wind,

translation.pt: minha vária, sempre incerta
translation.en: my errant, unknown,

translation.pt: navegação.
translation.en: endless navigation.

translation.pt: Nem a demanda conseguirás
translation.en: You’ll never succeed in completing

translation.pt: que se acabe – mesmo que a ti a fortuna se confie,
translation.en: your quest, even if fortune is on your side,

translation.pt: nem o estudo será para teu gáudio – ainda que dos sábios inspirado,
translation.en: nor will study be your exaltation, though wise men inspire you,

translation.pt: nem te assistirá o talento e o consolo abrandará o teu anseio,
translation.en: nor will talent help you, or consolation calm your yearning,

translation.pt: nem que fosse o amor podias viver livremente.
translation.en: and even if you had love you wouldn’t be free.

translation.pt: E nem mesmo o profeta ditando versos terá discípulos
translation.en: Not even the prophet dictating verses will have disciples,

translation.pt: se jamais concilia os escrivães com a sua mágoa,
translation.en: since the scribes will never grasp his deepest regret,

translation.pt: nem o jovem será de graça favorecido – pois ela o trairá,
translation.en: nor will grace avail the young man, who’s sure to lose it,

translation.pt: nem o rio que outrora baptizaste lembrarás
translation.en: nor will you remember the river you once christened

translation.pt: se sob a névoa o não vires primeiro.
translation.en: if you don’t first see it beneath the mist.

translation.pt: Donde ides então para que vos siga piamente
translation.en: So where are you going that I should devoutly follow?

translation.pt: – acaso atalharemos o país de cerradas dunas como campas,
translation.en: Will we cut across the country dotted by dunes as by tombstones

translation.pt: quando na distância os dois brilharmos – os
translation.en: when in the distance the two of us brightly shine – the

translation.pt: dois entre solenes risos de guardar silêncio?
translation.en: two of us with solemn smiles harboring silence?

translation.pt: Longe do que pensaríamos algum dia consentido,
translation.en: Far from what we’d ever think would be allowed,

translation.pt: longe de nos julgarmos sob funesta sina,
translation.en: far from imagining ourselves under an ill-omened star,

translation.pt: do que irá passar-se brevemente o saberemos:
translation.en: what’s going to happen we’ll soon know:

translation.pt: – muitas vezes soubemos quanto a beleza tarda,
translation.en: – we often had to wait the longest time for beauty,

translation.pt: mas só ela tolera dispormos do mundo fugazmente
translation.en: but only she lets us take fleeting advantage of the world

translation.pt: e com essa cega mágoa ir mais além.
translation.en: and pass, with that blind regret, beyond it.

translation.pt: Do meu encontro vivo com as cousas
translation.en: My living encounter with the humble

translation.pt: Humildes da Natura, nascem almas,
translation.en: Things of Nature gives birth to souls,

translation.pt: Aparições divinas,
translation.en: Divine apparitions,

translation.pt: Que, abstractas, me contemplam, não sei donde,
translation.en: Which abstractly behold me from I don’t know where,

translation.pt: Não sei de que lugar desconhecido
translation.en: From I don’t know what unfamiliar place

translation.pt: E fora deste espaço em que aparecem
translation.en: Outside this space

translation.pt: As árvores e os penedos.
translation.en: In which trees and rocks appear.

translation.pt: Vejo espectros, imagens do Mistério,
translation.en: I see specters, images of Mystery,

translation.pt: Quiméricas figuras,
translation.en: Fantastical figures,

translation.pt: Perfis de lume impressos no crepúsculo,
translation.en: Glowing outlines imprinted on the dusk,

translation.pt: Como sinais de agoiro. . .
translation.en: Like so many omens. . .

translation.pt: Perfis de palidez alvorecendo ao longe,
translation.en: Outlines of pallor emerging in the distance,

translation.pt: E tristezas que são retratos esvaídos,
translation.en: And sorrows that are fading portraits

translation.pt: De ignotas Divindades. . .
translation.en: Of unknown Divinities. . .

translation.pt: Estátuas do silêncio e da melancolia,
translation.en: Statues of silence and melancholy

translation.pt: Na solidão dos montes. . .
translation.en: In the solitude of the hills. . .

translation.pt: Atitudes da Esfinge no deserto,
translation.en: Sphinxian postures in the desert,

translation.pt: A sombra das Pirâmides ao sol,
translation.en: The shadows of the Pyramids in the sun,

translation.pt: E Platão arrastando a túnica de luz,
translation.en: And Plato dragging his tunic of light

translation.pt: Entre os padres do Egipto, hieráticos e tristes,
translation.en: Among Egypt’s sad and solemn priests

translation.pt: Vestidos de poeira e de penumbras mortas,

translation.pt: Nos templos de luar e empedernidas nuvens. . .
translation.en: In temples of moonlight and petrified clouds. . .

translation.pt: Vejo, diante de mim, quiméricas presenças,
translation.en: I see before me fantastical presences,

translation.pt: Horizontes de sonho que me cingem
translation.en: Dreamed horizons that gird me

translation.pt: Num doloroso abraço! Escuras aves
translation.en: In a painful embrace! Dark birds that alight

translation.pt: Que me pousam na fronte anoitecida,
translation.en: On my brow, where night has fallen,

translation.pt: E ventos que me levam através
translation.en: And winds that carry me through

translation.pt: De névoas e relâmpagos. . .
translation.en: Mists and lightning. . .

translation.pt: E, já perdido e morto, não sou mais
translation.en: Already lost and dead, I’m no more

translation.pt: Que uma aparência humana,
translation.en: Than a human appearance,

translation.pt: Boiando sobre as ondas da emoção
translation.en: Floating over the waves of emotion

translation.pt: Que brotam, cá de dentro, como sangue
translation.en: That surge inside me like blood

translation.pt: Duma ferida aberta. . .
translation.en: From an open wound. . .

translation.pt: E vou à flor das ondas que se espraiam
translation.en: And I ride the waves, which spread

translation.pt: Em litorais de neve e branca espuma,
translation.en: Over shores of snow and white foam,

translation.pt: Em distâncias azuis de claridade infinda,
translation.en: In blue distances of endless clarity,

translation.pt: E no vago nocturno em que as estrelas
translation.en: And in the nocturnal vagueness where stars

translation.pt: Afloram, como risos do demónio. . .
translation.en: Emerge, like smiles of the devil. . .

translation.pt: Flutuo num sonho aéreo,
translation.en: I float on a lofty dream,

translation.pt: Em alturas de místico esplendor,
translation.en: In heights of mystic splendor,

translation.pt: Onde abre o lírio branco do luar.
translation.en: Where the white lily of moonlight opens.

translation.pt: Flutuo num sonho aéreo, em que me vejo
translation.en: I float on a lofty dream, in which I see

translation.pt: Um ser indefinido. . . A noite imensa,
translation.en: Myself as an indefinite being. . . The vast night,

translation.pt: Que estende sobre mim as negras asas,
translation.en: Spreading over me its black wings,

translation.pt: Não me pode esconder. A minha face,
translation.en: Cannot hide me. My face,

translation.pt: Erguida para além da escuridão,
translation.en: Risen above the darkness,

translation.pt: Contempla a Luz divina./pre>
translation.en: Contemplates the divine Moon.

translation.pt: Nem a demanda conseguirás
translation.en: You’ll never succeed in completing

translation.pt: que se acabe – mesmo que a ti a fortuna se confie,
translation.en: your quest, even if fortune is on your side,

translation.pt: nem o estudo será para teu gáudio – ainda que dos sábios inspirado,
translation.en: nor will study be your exaltation, though wise men inspire you,

translation.pt: nem te assistirá o talento e o consolo abrandará o teu anseio,
translation.en: nor will talent help you, or consolation calm your yearning,

translation.pt: nem que fosse o amor podias viver livremente.
translation.en: and even if you had love you wouldn’t be free.

translation.pt: E nem mesmo o profeta ditando versos terá discípulos
translation.en: Not even the prophet dictating verses will have disciples,

translation.pt: se jamais concilia os escrivães com a sua mágoa,
translation.en: since the scribes will never grasp his deepest regret,

translation.pt: nem o jovem será de graça favorecido – pois ela o trairá,
translation.en: nor will grace avail the young man, who’s sure to lose it,

translation.pt: nem o rio que outrora baptizaste lembrarás
translation.en: nor will you remember the river you once christened

translation.pt: se sob a névoa o não vires primeiro.
translation.en: if you don’t first see it beneath the mist.

translation.pt: Donde ides então para que vos siga piamente
translation.en: So where are you going that I should devoutly follow?

translation.pt: – acaso atalharemos o país de cerradas dunas como campas,
translation.en: Will we cut across the country dotted by dunes as by tombstones

But one arise, — we come, we come!'

translation.en: 'Tis but the living who are dumb. In vain — in vain: strike other chords;

translation.pt: Enche o copo de vinho de Samos!

translation.en: Leave battles to the Turkish hordes,

translation.en: And shed the blood of Scio's vine!
translation.pt: E verte o sangue da vinha de Quios!

translation.en: Hark! rising to the ignoble call —
translation.pt: Escuta! Levantando-se ao chamado ignóbil -

translation.en: How answers each bold Bacchanal! You have the Pyrrhic dance as yet,
translation.pt: Como responde cada audaz bacanal! Até agora tens a dança pírrica,

translation.en: Where is the Pyrrhic phalanx gone?

translation.en: Of two such lessons, why forget
translation.pt: De tais lições, por que esquecer

translation.en: The nobler and the manlier one?
translation.pt: A mais nobre e viril das duas?

translation.en: You have the letters Cadmus gave —
translation.pt: Tens as letras que Cadmo deu -

translation.en: Think ye he meant them for a slave? Fill high the bowl with Samian wine!
translation.pt: Julgas que ele as quis dar a escravos? Enche a taça de vinho de Samos!

translation.en: We will not think of themes like these!
translation.pt: Não pensaremos em tais assuntos!

translation.en: It made Anacreon's song divine:
translation.pt: Isto fez dos versos de Anacreonte divinos:

translation.en: He served — but served Polycrates —
translation.pt: Ele serviu - mas serviu Polícrates -

translation.en: A tyrant; but our masters then
translation.pt: Um tirano; mas nossos senhores de então

translation.en: Were still, at least, our countrymen. The tyrant of the Chersonese
translation.pt: Ainda eram, ao menos, nossos compatriotas. O tirano de Quersoneso

translation.en: Was freedom's best and bravest friend;
translation.pt: Era o melhor e mais valente amigo da liberdade;

translation.en: That tyrant was Miltiades!
translation.pt: Aquele tirano era Milcíades!

translation.en: O! that the present hour would lend
translation.pt: Ah! Que houvesse hoje em dia

translation.en: Another despot of the kind!
translation.pt: Outro déspota desse tipo!

translation.en: Such chains as his were sure to bind. Fill high the bowl with Samian wine!
translation.pt: Cadeias como as suas firmam deveras. Enche a taça de vinho de Samos!

translation.en: On Suli's rock, and Parga's shore,
translation.pt: No rochedo de Suli, e na praia de Parga,

translation.en: Exists the remnant of a line
translation.pt: Há remanescentes duma linhagem

translation.en: Such as the Doric mothers bore;
translation.pt: Como as que mães dórias dão à luz;

translation.en: And there, perhaps, some seed is sown,
translation.pt: E lá, talvez, semeia-se algo,

translation.en: The Heracleidan blood might own. Trust not for freedom to the Franks —
translation.pt: Que pode ter o sangue de Hércules. Não confies tua liberdade aos francos -

translation.en: They have a king who buys and sells;
translation.pt: Eles têm um rei que compra e vende;

translation.en: In native swords, and native ranks,
translation.pt: Em espadas e tropas nativas,

translation.en: The only hope of courage dwells;
translation.pt: Reside a única esperança de bravura;

translation.en: But Turkish force, and Latin fraud,
translation.pt: Mas a força turca, e a fraude latina,

translation.en: Would break your shield, however broad. Fill high the bowl with Samian wine!
translation.pt: Quebrariam teu escudo, por mais largo que fosse. Enche a taça de vinho de Samos!

translation.en: Our virgins dance beneath the shade—
translation.pt: Nossas virgens dançam sob a sombra -

translation.en: I see their glorious black eyes shine;
translation.pt: Eu vejo brilharem seus gloriosos olhos negros;

translation.en: But gazing on each glowing maid,
translation.pt: Mas olhando cada criada radiante,

translation.en: My own the burning teardrop laves,
translation.pt: Os meus derramam lágrima candente,

translation.en: To think such breasts must suckle slaves. Place me on Sunium's marbled steep,
translation.pt: Pensar que tais seios devem amamentar escravos. Deixa-me no precipício marmóreo de Sunião

translation.en: Where nothing, save the waves and I,
translation.pt: Onde nada, salvo as ondas e eu,

translation.en: May hear our mutual murmurs sweep;
translation.pt: Pode ouvir-nos murmurar mutuamente;

translation.en: There, swanlike, let me sing and die:
translation.pt: Ali, como um cisne, deixa-me cantar e morrer:

translation.en: A land of slaves shall ne'er be mine—
translation.pt: Uma terra de escravos jamais será a minha -

translation.en: Dash down yon cup of Samian wine!
translation.pt: Joga lá embaixo o copo de vinho de Samos!

translation.en: Give me women, wine, and snuff

translation.en: Until I cry out "Hold, enough!"

translation.en: You may do so sans objection

translation.en: Till the day of resurrection:

translation.en: For, bless my beard, they aye shall be
translation.pt: Pois, abençoada seja minha barba, eles serão

translation.en: My beloved Trinity.

translation.en: Shed no tear! Oh, shed no tear!

translation.en: To ease my breast of melodies,--

translation.pt: Me veja! É essa elevação prateada

translation.en: Ever cures the good man's ill.

translation.pt: Eu desapareço no azul do céu

translation.en: Adieu, adieu!

translation.en: From childhood’s hour I have not been

translation.en: My passions from a common spring— From the same source I have not taken

translation.pt: E tudo o que tenho amado - tenho-o amado sozinho - Depois - na minha infância - no alvorecer

translation.en: Of a most stormy life—was drawn

translation.en: From ev’ry depth of good and ill

translation.en: The mystery which binds me still— From the torrent, or the fountain—

translation.en: Alike scent of spring it was

translation.en: And company doesn’t mean security,

translation.en: With your head up and your eyes open

translation.en: With the grace of a woman, not the grief of a child.

translation.en: And you learn to build all your roads on today,

translation.en: Because tomorrow’s ground is too uncertain for plans,

translation.en: And futures have a way of falling down in mid-flight.

translation.en: That even sunshine burns if you get too much.

translation.en: And you learn that you really can endure,

translation.en: And you really do have worth.

translation.en: And you learn and learn,

translation.en: With every goodbye you learn.

translation.en: Tonight before you go to bed
